component.name: Li-Ri
component.summary: Li-Ri is a arcade game where you drive a toy wood engine.

description.p: Li-Ri is a arcade game licensed under the GPL (General Public License).

You drive a toy wood engine in many levels and you must collect all the coaches for win. You can download it and play indefinitely. It's Free. You can play on 'Windows', 'Linux', 'Mac OsX', 'Android'.

ul.li: 19 languages: Arabic, Breton, Chinese, English, Esperanto, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Polish, Turkish, Hungarian, Dutch.
50 levels in this version.
3 beautiful musics and many sound effects.

description.p: Li-Ri is a fork of Ri-li (http://www.ri-li.org).
